Texts.Chs: 骨矛的右键攻击是非常好的狩猎技能。它会造成流血伤害，并且属于弓箭伤害，所以你将能得到更多的^green;皮革^reset;，以制造出你需要的各种道具。
Texts.Eng: The bone spear has a useful alternate attack. ^orange;Hunters Thrust^reset; counts as bow damage, making it a deadly hunting implement that also causes bleed damage! In turn, you will be able to get more ^green;leather^reset; to craft even more goods!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;骨头^reset;是用处极广的材料。如果你采集到了，请尝试在你的^orange;铁砧^reset;做一个^orange;骨矛^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Bone^reset; is pretty useful right now. With it, you can fashion weapons and armor. Try making a ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; on your ^orange;anvil^reset;.
